      • Board

        public Board(Match match,
             java.lang.String type)
        This method generate a board from a json file and generate the decks of cards
        Parameters:
        match - represent the match that need the Board
        type - is the path of the json file that describes the board

      • find

        public Square find(int x,
                   int y)
            throws NotFoundException
        This method return the Square from the coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - represent the x coordinate of the Square to find
        y - represent the y coordinate of the Square to find
        Returns:
        the Square of coordinate x, y
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - is thrown when does not exist in this board a Square with coordinates x,y
